Recap: Schuyler is devastated after Oliver informs him that Sierra is his (Oliver's) daughter and not Schuyler's. He secretly takes Allison's gun when she is distracted. He declares that he must get Gigi back because she is his life and the only thing that broke them up is a lie. Allison reveals to a devastated Roxy who assumes the baby she gave birth to died all those years ago, that he did not. Yet Roxy has no clue whom her son would be. Starr is really angry at Langston for putting her up to lying to Markko for her and not admitting that she is sleeping with Ford. Markko knows that Langston is lying to him about something and asks Cole what he might know and asks him to attempt to find out from Starr. Kim knows she has to break it off with Clint. So she tells him she's cheated on him after David has blackmailed her in order not to take his birthright from him.
Transcript: Kelly: Wait a minute, stop. I need to talk to her.
Sol: The prisoner is in custody, Miss.
Kelly: It's in connection with a crime.
Todd: We're with "The Sun."
Kelly: It won't take very long. I just have a few questions. What can you tell me about my mother's death?

Cole: I saw the way you were looking at Langston. Whatever this is, it can't just be about her play.

Langston: Please, Starr. Please, I'm begging you. Just keep this between the two of us. You said you were my best friend.
Starr: Okay, fine. I won't tell Cole, but only for now.
Langston: You're missing the point. I don't like the direction she's going, Cole. It's horrible.

Kim: Well, I did care. You know why? Because you knew who I really was, and you liked me anyway. I'll never forget you, Clint Buchanan.

[Kim crying]

Kim: All you care about is your piece of the Buchanan pie.

Kim: Well, don't get too comfortable. I may be down, but I am not out.
David: Are you threatening me, J.V.?
Kim: You're damn right, and I will get my husband back, and when I do, I will destroy you.
